extra_link.text: League of Legends (LoL) is a multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games for Microsoft Windows and macOS.
Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed by Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment.
Magic: the Gathering, is a trading card game (TCG) and which in September 2019 received a digital adaptation known as Magic: The Gathering Arena.
The Evolution Championship Series, commonly known as Evo, is an annual esports event that focuses exclusively on fighting games.
Pokémon is a game franchise that has game disputes across consoles. Being played in the Junior, Senior and Master categories.
Valorant is a free multiplayer electronic game to play first person shooter developed and published by Riot Games.
